name: Smugglers Cove
description:
Smugglers Cove is a first person, escape room style puzzle game. You are an explorer during the golden age of piracy, you came across an abandoned smugglers hide-away and decide to investigate. 

You become trapped! and now you must find your way through the hideouts hidden puzzles and secrets to escape back to your ship, perhaps learning of the life of the smugglers that's once called this cove home along your journey.
